controls.name: Custom Deck
controls.value:
[
    {
        "Name": "Kiss",
        "Copies": 1,
        "_comment1": "Copies is how many of this card will be placed in the play deck.",
        "Requirements": [],
        "_comment2": "Requirements: Array List, Include any required objects/toys, or if the",
        "_comment3": "target player needs a Penis or Vagina via 'Penis':true",
        "Activities": ["Kissing"],
        "_comment4": "Array List of any of the activities involved in the card (for hard limits)",
        "Permanent": false,
        "_comment5": "is this card a 'rule' that lasts multiple rounds?",
        "Reroll": false,
        "_commentsc": "when this card is Permanent, will it Reroll the Random Number (true) or keep the Random value?",
        "Random": "(30|60)",
        "_comment6": "Use a number, can be random, uses Xtoys number syntax",
        "Timer": true,
        "_comment7": "Is this number used for a timer?",
        "Secret": false,
        "SecretText": null,
        "_comment8": "Should this card's action be a secret to the target?  If so, display",
        "_comment9": "the SecretText and wait before displaying the rest of the text below.",
        "_comment0": "The text below can vary if the 'top' player performing the act has a ",
        "_commenta": "Penis or Vagina.  [tar] and [top] will be replaced with the appropriate",
        "_commentb": "player's names.  [rnd] will be replaced with the number used from above.",
        "TopPenisText": "[top] will approach [tar] and kiss them for [rnd] seconds.",
        "TopVaginaText": null
    },
    {
        "Name": "Grope",
        "Copies": 1,
        "Requirements": [],
        "Activities": ["Groping"],
        "Permanent": false,
        "Random": "(30|60)",
        "Timer": true,
        "TopPenisText": "[top] will approach [tar] and grope them for [rnd] seconds.",
        "TopVaginaText": null
    }
]
controls.description: This lets you add custom cards to the game.
